admission_text:
# Visit

## Museum Hours

**Tuesday – Saturday**  
10 am – 5 pm

**Sunday**  
1 – 5 pm

**Monday**  
Closed

 _Last entry to the Museum is at 4 pm._

##### **First Thursday Late Nights**

On the first Thursday of every month, September through May, last admission is extended to 7 pm. The Museum closes at 8 pm. 

## General Admission

Adults |  $12  
---|---  
Seniors |  $9  
Active Military |  $7  
Students |  $5  
Museums for All   
Adults with SNAP EBT Card  |  $3  
Children under 12, Members,   
New London residents |  Free  
Students and Staff at New London Public Schools, Connecticut College, United States Coast Guard Academy, and Mitchell College |  Free  
  
## Visit

New London residents, students and staff at New London Public Schools, Connecticut College, United States Coast Guard Academy, and Mitchell College receive free general admission. 

 _Fees may apply for programs._

##### **Members**

Members receive unlimited free admission, as well as shop and program discounts, invitations to special events, and more. 

[ Join / renew today ](https://www.lymanallyn.org/membership/)

## Construction

Pardon our appearance! In October 2024 we began work on the development of Lyman Allyn Park. This major project will transform the Museum’s outdoor space into a twelve-acre urban art park. The Museum is working with Downes Construction Co. who is managing the project. The first phase begins with a range of tree work, including pruning, trimming, and removal of some trees tha...

# The arts and  
culture app.

Download Now

[](https://app.bloombergconnects.org/zqMVquMuAlb)

# The arts and culture app.

[Download now](https://app.bloombergconnects.org/zqMVquMuAlb)

## Explore expert-curated guides from cultural institutions across the globe

With the free Bloomberg Connects app, explore expert-curated content and guides to over 1250 museums, galleries, sculpture parks, gardens, and [cultural spaces](https://www.bloombergconnects.org/guides/) from the palm of your hand. From behind-the-scenes guides, to artist and expert-curated video and audio content, Bloomberg Connects makes it easy to discover arts and culture, anytime, anywhere.

## Explore expert-curated guides from cultural institutions across the globe

With the free Bloomberg Connects app, explore expert-curated content and guides to over 1250 museums, galleries, sculpture parks, gardens, and cultural spaces from the palm of your hand. From behind-the-scenes guides, to artist and expert-curated video and audio content, Bloomberg Connects makes it easy to discover arts and culture, anytime, anywhere.

## Thousands of hours of content from 1250+ institutions, for free

Bloomberg Connects features thousands of hours of bespoke audio, video and text content, with more content being added every month. The app makes it easy for you to explore arts and culture on your own time, at your own pace. Quick snackable content or deep dives. On site or from home. In your city or around the world.
